snippet.title: Dragon's Dogma - Hard Mode and Speed Run Mode trailer
snippet.description:
Put your skills to the test in Dragon's Dogma with Speedrun and Hard modes. Speedrun will challenge you to clear the game as quickly as possible with in-game equipment awarded for those fast enough; while Hard Mode turns up the difficulty with more difficult enemies and greater rewards.

More Dragon's dogma:

'Like' on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/dragonsdogma

Follow on Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/dragonsdogmacap

Subscribe on YouTube:
